titleStmt.title: A dayly exercise of the devout Christian Containing several most pithy practices of piety; in order to live holily and dye happily. Published by T.V. Monk, of the holy order of St. Benedict.
Dayly exercise of the devout Rosarists.
titleStmt.author: T. V. (Thomas Vincent), 1604-1681.
A. C. (Arthur Crowther), 1588-1666. aut

editionStmt.edition: The third edition, digested into better order, with many material additions, and alterations.

notesStmt.note: Earlier editions are "by A.C. [i.e. Arthur Crowther] and T.V. [i.e. Thomas Vincent]".
An edition of: "The daily exercise, of the devout Rosarists", published in 1657.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
